{{ja-kanjitab|あずさ|yomi=k}} {{IPAchar|/adusa/}} → {{IPAchar|/ad͡zusa/}} → {{IPAchar|/azusa/}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=あずさ|-}}, first attested in the ''{{w|Kojiki}}'' (712 {{CE}}). {{rfe|ja}}
